SNOPEA(1) | CSNOBOL4B 2.2 | December 5, 2020

NAME

snopea – convert SNOBOL snopea documentation to roff and HTML

SYNOPSIS

snopea [--format format] [--section section] [--page pagename] in out

DESCRIPTION

The snopea(1) command converts embedded documentation in snopea(7) format to man(7) or HTML format.

OPTIONS

--format
Takes either roff or html as an argument (otherwise the output format will be inferred from the output file name).

--section
Takes a single digit section number (otherwise the section number will be inferred from the output file name).

--page
Takes a page name as an argument (otherwise the page name will be inferred from the output file name).

NOT CONFORMING TO

Inspired by (but not compatible with) Perl POD format.

AUTHOR

Philip L. Budne

SEE ALSO

snobol4(1), snopea(7)
